thread.title: Seven Earth-sized planets found orbiting single star
thread.title_full: Seven Earth-sized planets found orbiting single star

title: Seven Earth-sized planets found orbiting single star
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Seven Earth-sized planets found orbiting single star 22 February 2017 Last updated at 18:16 GMT 
Seven planets have been discovered in a solar system 40 light-years from Earth. 
The researchers say that all seven could potentially support liquid water on the surface, depending on the other properties of those planets.
